mkv38:2: katamat karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo daridro bhavati tyāgavān. ucyate. ihaikatyena pudgalena bahu dānaṁ dattaṁ bhavati. tiryaggateṣu manuṣyeṣu ca duḥśīleṣv abrahmacāriṣu. punaḥ punas tyāgacittam abhyastam. sa yadā manuṣyeṣūpapadyate daridro bhavati tyāgavān tena dānābhyāsena. yat tu tenāpātrabhūteṣu dānaṁ dattaṁ tena daridraḥ. yathā śrāvastyāṁ tatra vinaye tantravāyasya nidānaṁ varṇayanti. sa tyāgavān daridraś ca. punaḥ punas tyāgacittam abhyastam. idaṁ karma yena samanvāgataḥ pudgalo daridro bhavati tyāgavān.
